title: Image and Impact
creator_credit: Sandra Ostertag, CBS, Coast Community Colleges, Holt, Rinehart and Winston and KOCE-TV (Television station : Huntington Beach, Calif.)
brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “The Photographic vision”.
Introduces the philosophy of this 20 part course which previews program guests and concepts to be taught over the series. Photographic vision is seen as a means of personal growth and individual expression.
creator_credit_for_label: Sandra Ostertag, CBS, Coast Community Colleges, Holt, Rinehart and Winston and KOCE-TV (Television station : Huntington Beach, Calif.)
